statement.p: In 30.43 of the last 23 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{23}}={0.3043}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{23}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3043}\cdot{23}={6.9989}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 23-6.9989=16.0011 We round that as requested to 16.
